user_question: How can I improve my butterfly stroke technique and generate an image of a swimmer performing the butterfly stroke?
final_answer: To improve your butterfly stroke technique, focus on body position, arm movement, and kick timing. Common mistakes to avoid include lifting the head too high, not keeping the body streamlined, and improper timing of the kick and arm movements. Image of a swimmer performing the butterfly stroke generated.
